title: Sarah Jessica Parker stuns in plunging velvet jumpsuit alongside supermodel Irina Shayk
text:

Sarah Jessica Parker , 54, looked incredible in a plunging black velvet jumpsuit at a fashion event on Tuesday night.

The Sex And The City star showed of her svelte figure in the chic number, with sheer sleeves and a black belt cinching in her waist.

She wore black and silver sparkly brogues on her feet, paired with a silver glittery handbag and diamond earrings.

Her long blonde hair flowed down in tousled waves and her black smokey eye make up made her blue eyes pop.

The actress was attending a show by fashion brand Intimissimi in Verona, and she was joined by supermodel Irina Shayk, who is the face of the brand.

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

Irina looked stunning in a black sheer glittery playsuit which gave a glimpse of her black underwear underneath.

She paired it with black thigh high boots, a black western style belt, and a tiny white clutch bag.

Her hair was styled in a sleek chignon and her make up was minimal, letting her gorgeous skin glow.

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

Sarah Jessica Parker recently blew SATC fans' minds with her wild theory about the show.

The actress, who starred as journalist Carrie Bradshaw in the hit show, dropped a bombshell theory that will make fans reconsider everything they know about it.

The HBO hit, which ran for six seasons and two movies, followed New Yorker Carrie as she negotiated life, work and dating in the city with her best friends Miranda (Cynthia Nixon), Charlotte (Kirstin Davis) and Samantha (Kim Cattrall).

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

Fans watched as Carrie gossiped with her friends, they attended fancy parties, and the ladies supported each other through tough times.

They also seemed to be recurring characters in her weekly newspaper column, with her voiceover on the show detailing what she was writing about every time.

But now, Sarah has suggested that Carrie's friends may have never even existed.

(Image: Daniele Venturelli/WireImage)

She told News.com.au : "Think about it: did Carrie make them up?

"She's telling a story every week. This is her point of view, it's almost always her point of view."

Sarah, who is married to actor Matthew Broderick, pointed out that this was the first time in the show that her character wasn't telling the story, proving that the laptop was "the conduit" for her friends to exist.

She said: "Think about it for a second, right?"
description: Sarah Jessica Parker and Irina Shayk looked stunning at an intimate fashion show in Italy
